ENG-35: Granular Error Recovery

Session State Machine with Phase-Level Retry and Crash Recovery

Session Phases

1 ORIENT Read project state
2 STATUS_CHECK Get task status
3 VERIFICATION Run verification
4 IMPLEMENTATION Write code
5 COMMIT Git commit
6 MARK_DONE Update task status
7 NOTIFY Send Telegram
8 MEMORY_FLUSH Save context

Recovery Rules

phase <= VERIFICATION
Restart from ORIENT (cheap phases)
phase == IMPLEMENTATION
Retry only IMPLEMENTATION
phase >= COMMIT
Retry only this phase (code written!)
Max retries per phase
2 attempts, then escalate or degrade

Graceful Degradation

MCP Server Timeout
Retry 3x, then skip notification/status update continue coding
Playwright Crash
Skip screenshot, add comment "unavailable" don't block
Git Error
Stash changes, retry commit save diff
Rate Limit (429)
Exponential backoff: 30s → 60s → 120s

Crash Recovery

On startup
Check .agent/session_state.json
Incomplete phase found
Resume from last checkpoint
phase == IMPLEMENTATION
Check git status for uncommitted changes
Report
"Recovering from interrupted session..."
